00011 ElapsedTime::ElapsedTime()
00012 {
00013     // init StartTime
00014     Reset();
00015 }
00016 
00018 ElapsedTime::~ElapsedTime()
00019 {
00020 }
00021 
00023 void ElapsedTime::Reset()
00024 {
00025     struct timeval CurrentTimeOfDay;
00026 
00027     // retrieve the current time
00028     gettimeofday(&CurrentTimeOfDay, NULL);
00029 
00030     // Compute the time in ms since epoque
00031     StartTime = CurrentTimeOfDay.tv_sec * 1000 + CurrentTimeOfDay.tv_usec/1000;
00032 }
00033 
00038 unsigned int ElapsedTime::Get(bool DoReset /* = false */)
00039 {
00040     struct timeval CurrentTimeOfDay;
00041     unsigned int   CurrentTime;
00042     unsigned int   CurrentElapsedTime;
00043 
00044     // retrieve the current time
00045     gettimeofday(&CurrentTimeOfDay, NULL);
00046 
00047     // Compute the time in ms since epoque
00048     CurrentTime = CurrentTimeOfDay.tv_sec * 1000 + CurrentTimeOfDay.tv_usec/1000;
00049 
00050     CurrentElapsedTime = CurrentTime - StartTime;
00051 
00052     if ( DoReset == true )
00053     {
00054         // Reset the Time and return elapsed time
00055         StartTime = CurrentTime;
00056     }
00057 
00058     return CurrentElapsedTime;
00059 }
